content: nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting amigurumi crochet patterns car skill level beginner 1 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting little car amigurumi for all those children who don t like teddy bears and dolls it s perfect for little children because it s soft and small just the right size to be hold by tiny hands pattern notes materials and equipment on 10 gr brown white black gray yellow fingering acrylic yarn 100g-438mt crochet hook size 10 us steel 1 3mm polyester toy stuffing wooden sticks for stuffing scissors large yarn needle stitch marker pipe cleaners chenille stems abbreviation & symbols round round magic_ring - magic_ring magic_ring magic loop chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet increase increase 2sc in next stitch decrease decrease 2sc off together slip_stitch slip_stitch es sts stitches half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet 2 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting dtr double treble_crochet blo back loops only flo - front loops only round brackets indicate a group of stitches to be worked in to the same stitch or space or the amount of stitches you should have or completion of the round or row it follows or explanatory notes within the pattern square brackets contain a group of stitches to be worked the amount of times indicated after the brackets inches about the pattern this pattern works in continuous spiral round do not join rounds unless otherwise stated mark the first stitch of each round by using a stitch-marker or a piece of yarn between two stitches a magic_ring is a way to begin crocheting in the round by crocheting over an adjustable loop and then pulling the loop tight the advantage of the magic_ring method below right is that unlike the regular chain 2 x single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook method below left there is no hole left in the middle of your starting round pattern car with the yarn and hook specified car measures approximately 2 ×4 5×9cm roof take the brown yarn round 1 in a magic_ring single_crochet 4 4sc round 2 3 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12sc round 3 1 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 2 single_crochet 3 times 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 1 single_crochet 20sc 3 nadezhda kosmakova handmade toys https //www etsy com/shop/myjoyknitting round 4 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 4 single_crochet 3 times 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 2 single_crochet 28sc round 5 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 6 single_crochet 3 times 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 3 single_crochet 36sc round 6 4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 8 single_crochet 3 times 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 4 single_crochet 44sc end with a slip_stitch cut the yarn with scissors it forms a square take the white yarn round 1 44 single_crochet crochet blo only this round rnds 2-5 single_crochet in each st around 4 rounds 44sc end with a slip_stitch cut the yarn
